review.comment:
I’m with a Indianapolis band called The Silver Birds.We looked around at different companies around the world to help us with making a vinyl album.So I was introduced to Chip at Indy Vinyl Pressings.I really loved that they were from my hometown.
So let me just say we have the records and we have sold a lot and I hear it all the time “Your Album Sounds Great”Chip and his team at Indy Vinyl were just fantastic to work with and very professional.They will make you feel like you have someone on your side.
These guys can't be beat. They can do about anything you want.  Ask Them to show you some of the cool custom work they have done in the past!
I received top notch service from Chip and the folks at Optical in the manufacturing of my new LP. I couldn't have been happier with the communication, timeliness and deliverables.
review.review_reply: Thanks, Nate! You made such an awesome recording!  Gnarly Ebow performance and all! Thanks for choosing Indy Vinyl Pressing!  Chip and The IVP Team
